detectors.description:
SimpleToken.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SimpleToken__3.sol#431-433) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _mint(_msgSender(),2100000000 * (10 ** uint256(decimals()))) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SimpleToken__3.sol#432)
detectors.markdown:
[SimpleToken.constructor()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SimpleToken__3.sol#L431-L433) uses literals with too many digits:
	- [_mint(_msgSender(),2100000000 * (10 ** uint256(decimals())))](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SimpleToken__3.sol#L432)
